danish_publication: Lange-Margrete var en Tater og dræbte frugtsommelige kvinder og spiste hjærterne af börnene, for hun havde den tro, at når hun kunde nå at få 7, kunde hun blive usynlig. Men hun nåede kun at få 6. Så blev hun fanget og sat ind i et kjælderhul under den vestre flöj på N.-Vosborgs hovedbygning og senere halshugget. Det hul kaldes den dag i dag Lange-Margretes hul.
english_publication: Lange-Margrete was a gypsy and killed pregnant women and ate the hearts of the children, since she believed that, once she had managed to eat seven of them, she could become invisible. But she only managed to get six. Then she was caught and put down in a cellar hole under the west wing of Nørre Vosborg’s main building and later decapitated. That hole is called Lange-Margrete’s hole to this very day.
